name: bs-emotion-ppx
description: Adds labels to CSS classes generated by bs-emotion
author: Alex Fedoseev <alex.fedoseev@gmail.com>

scripts.box: rm -rf dist/* && mkdir -p dist/src && yarn run build && cp package.json README.md dist/ && cp bsconfig.npm.json dist/bsconfig.json && cp lib/bs/native/emotionppx.native dist/ppx && touch dist/src/EmotionPpx.re
